name: Magic Knight Rayearth
description:
As a world built on dreams crumbles toward extinction, three innocent girls from Earth, Hikaru, Umi, and Fuu, are summoned to the fantastic world of Cephiro, where they must become the warriors of legend that are the key to salvation.

As the story progresses, you may control any of the three main characters simply by pressing the right or left shift keys on the controller.

You'll need to use the special powers of each girl to reach the end, and uncover the shocking secret that awaits them.

Along the way, you can enjoy spoken dialogue in-game, as well as nearly 30 minutes of hand-drawn animation in this smash-hit action RPG from Japan
